Deuce smiled too and leaned in, wrapping his arms around Ty's waist as Ty wrapped his arms around Deuce's neck.
"Deuce, I have to tell you something." Ty said.
"Anything baby." Deuce smirked at Ty and looked down at him, "What's up?"
"I uh....I like um, chubby guys." Ty said, not looking at Deuce in the eyes. Deuce lifted Ty's chin up to look at him.
"So..you want me to destroy my abs, and get a big ol' chubby belly?" Deuce smirked down at his lover, knowing that he would do anything to make Ty happy; even if it meant getting fat and not fitting into any of his jeans. Deuce was also Ty's protecter. Ty nodded and blushed, smiling big.

"Sure baby, let's get started now." Deuce said, smiling and getting pulled out to the fridge by Ty.
